JOB DESCRIPTION: Responsibilities Build, improve and maintain   integrations to 3rd party applications using RESTful APIs Work closely with the frontend team   to integrate new features and unique consumer-facing products Communicate effectively with   customers and partners for queries related to APIs Establish best practices to   continually increase performance and scalability Qualifications A bachelors/masters degree in   Computer Science or equivalent knowledge and skills 5+ Years of experience designing   and developing enterprise applications using the full stack and databases Experience working in an agile   development environment  Experience working on AWS building   SaaS applications Skills At least 3 years of experience   writing production code in Java Experience in common Internet   technologies and protocols (HTTP, SSL, OAuth, JWT, JSON, XML, etc.) Experience with API tools such as   Postman, Swagger/OpenAPI etc. Experience in JUnit Cloud/SaaS development experience   and security analytics knowledge is a plus

EDUCATION.UG: B.Sc in Computers, BCA in Computers, B.Tech/B.E. in Computers
EDUCATION.PG: MCA in Computers, M.Tech in Computers, MS/M.Sc(Science) in Computers
